_header: He is be-gabbed loathly / That lets of other men hethely
Note: For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 2562.
_description: Gospel for Eleventh Sunday after Trinity, in Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
HE es begabbit laithelie þat lates of oþer men
                    hetheli…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Als did ane ermete in alde sitheþat i will tell and
                    ȝe will lithe
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HE is gabbed ful loþelyÞat leteþ of oþur
                    eþely…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As wende an hermyte an hundret siþeOf whom a tale
                    ȝe mowe her liþe
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Dixit Ihesu ad quosdam qui in se (f. 202rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
HE es begyled ful lothliþat of his broþer lates
                    hethely…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Als whilome of an heremyte felleOf whome I will a tale here
                    telle
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xja post festum trinitatis secundum Lucam (p.
                    254)

CULDd11.First Lines:
HE is skabbid ful lotheliÞat letiþ of anoþer
                    skornfulli…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…as wende an Ermyte an hundrid siþeof whom a tale ȝe
                    may here liþe
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dnca vndecima post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium secundum Lucam
                        Dixit ihesus ad quosdam qui in se confidebant & ce' (f.
                        159v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
He es be gabbyd lathlyÞat lattys of oþer men
                    hethely…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Als dyd an hermyte in olde sytheAls I sall tell and ȝe
                    wyll lythe
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
Þis es þe gospell of þe ellefyne sonunday post trinitatem
                    (f. 107v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
HE is gabbed ful loþeliÞat leteþ of oþer
                    eþeli…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…As wende an heremyte an hundred syþeOf whon a tale
                    þe mowe here lyþe
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Dixit Ihesus ad quosdam qui inse confidebant (f.
                    7rb)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
He es be gabbid lathelyThat latis of oþer mon
                    hethely…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Als dide ane hermete in alde sitheThat I will tell and
                    ȝe will lithe

MinULZ822.First Lines:
He es be gylde laythlyþat lattys of other
                    leythly…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…Als wende ane hermet ayndyr sytheOf wham a take here may
                    ȝe lythe

HunHM129.First Lines:
He is gabbit lolylyÞat lattys of oþir
                    helyly…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As wend and hermyte andersythOff whom a tale ȝe may here
                    lyth
